sentences.en: Best buys of the week are carrots, which are plentiful and cheap.
sentences.cn: 本星期买胡萝卜最合算, 因为货源充足,价格低廉.

sentences.en: Eggs are cheap when they are plentiful and they are dear when they are scarce.
sentences.cn: 鸡蛋多了就便宜,少了就贵.

sentences.en: Fish are plentiful in the lake.
From the Mississippi valley to the Atlantic coast, rainfall is plentiful.
sentences.cn: 从密西西比河流域到大西洋海岸一带, 雨量非常充足.

sentences.en: He had gone through a training for a plentiful table.
sentences.cn: 他经历了一场如何应付丰盛的餐桌的训练.

sentences.en: Hot climate and plentiful rainfall favour the growth of plants.
sentences.cn: 炎热的气候和充足的雨水有助于植物生长.

sentences.en: Money was plentiful, and rarely did anyone seem very bothered about levels of expenditure.
sentences.cn: 有足够的钱，似乎很难见到有人为花费而烦心。

sentences.en: Our food, such as it is, is plentiful.
sentences.cn: 我们吃的, 虽不很好, 却很丰富.

sentences.en: Rainfall is plentiful in the area.
The military depot has a plentiful supply of food.
sentences.cn: 这个兵站有富足的食品供应.

sentences.en: The region is blessed with plentiful rainfall and a mild climate.
sentences.cn: 这个地区雨量充足,气候温和.

sentences.en: Their family has a plentiful harvest this year.
There is a plentiful supply of arms on the black market.
sentences.cn: 黑市上有大量武器出售。
